entry.tran: 情绪失控;狂野情绪的爆发
entry.def: If someone is in hysterics or is having hysterics, they are in a state of uncontrolled excitement, anger, or panic.

example.ex: I'm sick of your having hysterics, okay?...
example.tran: 我受够了你的歇斯底里，知道吗？

example.ex: It is quite easy to get engulfed in the hysterics and you have to be careful.
example.tran: 人很容易情绪失控，你要小心。

entry.def: If someone is in hysterics or is having hysterics, they are in a state of violent and disturbed emotion that is usually a result of shock.

example.ex: It was such a shock I had hysterics...
example.tran: 这太让人震惊了，我的情绪濒于崩溃。

entry.def: You can say that someone is in hysterics or is having hysterics when they are laughing loudly in an uncontrolled way.

example.ex: He'd often have us all in absolute hysterics.
example.tran: 他经常让我们大家狂笑不止。

auth_sentence.content: Our boys almost fall off the couch in hysterics.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our boys almost fall off the couch in hysterics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our boys almost fall off the couch in hysterics.

auth_sentence.content: I was practically in hysterics from the time we landed.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was practically in hysterics from the time we landed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was practically in hysterics from the time we landed.

auth_sentence.content: She...burst into uncontrollable hysterics and began throwing crockery at the wall.
auth_sentence.res_content: She...burst into uncontrollable hysterics and began throwing crockery at the wall.

sentences.en: He always has hysterics at the sight of blood.
sentences.cn: 一看到血他常会歇斯底里发作。

sentences.en: My mum’ll have hysterics when she sees the colour of my hair.
sentences.cn: 妈妈看到我头发染成这种颜色会火冒三丈的。
